Title: SS-2016-003: Hostname, IP and Protocol Spoofing through HTTP Headers
Description: SS-2016-003: Hostname, IP and Protocol Spoofing through HTTP Headers
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 3.1.0 up to 3.1.16, all versions starting from 3.2.0 before 3.3.0
NotImpacted: All versions before 3.1.0, all versions after 3.1.16 before 3.2.0, all versions starting from 3.3.0
